channel.title: vim on pronvis.site
channel.description: Recent content in vim on pronvis.site

item.title: vim tips
item.description: Here I will place some vim tips to not to forget. Command promt <ctrl+r>" to paste yanked text to vim command prompt, link <ctl-r><ctl-w> to paste word under cursor to vim command prompt, link History q: to open vim history, it is possible to edit and search there like in normal mode, link mine vim config
